data.eml:eml: The genus Macroocula Panfilov in Egypt, with two new species (Hymenoptera: Bradynobaenidae: Apterogyninae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gadallah, Neveen S., Soliman, Ahmed M., Al-Shahat, Ahmed M., Hossni, Mohammed T. (2015): The genus Macroocula Panfilov in Egypt, with two new species (Hymenoptera: Bradynobaenidae: Apterogyninae). Zootaxa 4018 (3): 396-410, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4018.3.4
